scripts.build:apps: cd client/ && yarn && yarn build && yarn generate-test-data:lti && cd ../
scripts.build:v2: cd goreact-api-v2/ && yarn && yarn run dev && cd ../
scripts.setup: composer setup && yarn settings:merge && yarn docker up && yarn build:debug && yarn migrate && yarn seed
scripts.clean: yarn docker rm && git clean -d -e vendor/ -e composer.lock -e settings.json -e goreact-api-v2/.env -e docker/db-data/ -X -f
scripts.clean:hard: yarn docker rm && git clean -d -e settings.json -e goreact-api-v2/.env -X -f && composer reset && yarn docker pull && yarn docker build
scripts.clean:db: docker/helper.sh reset-db && yarn migrate && yarn seed
scripts.migrate: cd goreact-api-v2/ && php artisan migrate && cd ../
scripts.seed: cd goreact-api-v2/ && php artisan db:seed && cd ../
scripts.settings:copy: cd htdocs && cp -n settings.example.js settings.js || true && cd ../
scripts.test: yarn settings:copy && cd client/ && yarn test:dashboard && cd ../
scripts.branch-change: yarn run clean:db:hard && yarn run build:debug
scripts.cypress:run: cypress install && cypress run -b chrome --headed -P tests/
scripts.cypress:run:ci: cypress install && cypress run -b chrome -P tests/
